attributes.action: charge consumers for the number of new plastic bags they use, and encourage them to re-use old ones.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Plastic cannot be recycled, so we need to recycle plastic bags so that less end up being dumped. This will help the environment dramatically.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
